sn20.10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena annataro bhikkhu ativelam kulesu carittam apajjati.
sn20.10:1.5: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi vuccamano na viramati.
sn20.10:1.6: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn20.10:1.7: “idha, bhante, annataro bhikkhu ativelam kulesu carittam apajjati.
sn20.10:1.10: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi vuccamano na viramati”ti.
sn20.10:2.1: “Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, bilaro sandhisamalasankatire thito ahosi mudumusim maggayamano:
sn20.10:2.2: ‘yadayam mudumusi gocaraya pakkamissati, tattheva nam gahetva khadissami’ti.
sn20.10:2.3: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, mudumusi gocaraya pakkami.
sn20.10:2.4: Tamenam bilaro gahetva sahasa sankhaditva ajjhohari.
sn20.10:2.5: Tassa so mudumusi antampi khadi, antagunampi khadi.
sn20.10:2.6: So tatonidanam maranampi nigacchi maranamattampi dukkham.
sn20.10:3.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisati arakkhiteneva kayena arakkhitaya vacaya arakkhitena cittena, anupatthitaya satiya, asamvutehi indriyehi.
sn20.10:3.2: So tattha passati matugamam dunnivattham va dupparutam va.
sn20.10:3.3: Tassa matugamam disva dunnivattham va dupparutam va rago cittam anuddhamseti.
sn20.10:3.4: So raganuddhamsena cittena maranam va nigacchati maranamattam va dukkham.
sn20.10:3.5: Marananhetam, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati.
sn20.10:3.6: Maranamattanhetam, bhikkhave, dukkham yadidam annataram sankilittham apattim apajjati.
sn20.10:3.9: ‘rakkhiteneva kayena rakkhitaya vacaya rakkhitena cittena, upatthitaya satiya, samvutehi indriyehi gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisissama’ti.
